arabic.title: أنا مصمم
text: بتدارى عينك ليه لما بتيجى فى عينيا؟
وحكايتك بس ايه فيك حاجة مش عادية؟
قوللى يا حبيبى حاجة متصعبهاش عليا
انا مصمم مش ماشى قبل ما تتكلم
مقدرش اسيبك تتالم ساكت يا حبيبى ليه
انا ضايقتك؟ طب قلت حاجة ماتتقلش؟
قولى حبيبى بصراحة ومشاعرك ليا سيبها
الدمعة اللى فى عيونك عرفنى ايه سببها
عينك فى عنيا لكن حاسس بمسافة بينا
فى حاجات غالية علينا بتضيع يا حبيبى منا
عايز تعاتبنى عاتب طب ليه عمال تفكر
ماهو ده الوقت المناسب قبل الاحزان ماتكبر
يا حبيبى سايبنى ليه عايش فى الحيرة ديا
وان كان الغلط دة منى يبقى حقك عليا

english.title: I'm determined
text: (if so) then what is it about?
why do you hide your eyes from me?
what's up with you? there's something wrong about you
tell me anything, darling.Don't make it harder on me.
I'm determined, not leaving till you talk
I can't leave you to pain.why are you quiet, darling?
did I annoy You?did I say something that should haven't been said?
I'm not leaving & not letting you go
till I understand What's going on
tell me, darling honestly.leave your feelings to me
let me know the reason behind the tear in your eyes
we're (facing each other) eye to eye, but I feel a distance between us
we're losing things that are valuable to us
If you want to gently blame me, do it, why thinking too much ?
this's the right time before the sorrows grow
darling, why do you surrender me to this confusion?
If the mistake is mine then forgive me.

english.title: I'm determined
text: I was upset with you over something. So what, my love, is that that's covering up your eye? Why, when you come in front of my eyes,
And your story, but what is inside you is something that isn't normal. Tell me, my love, something that won't make me nervous.
I'm determined. I'm not going before you say "I can't leave you suffering silently," O, my love, why?
I annoyed you. Okay, I said something you just don't say.
I'm not going or letting you walk away before I understand what there is.
Tell me, my beloved. In all honesty, your feelings for me were lifted away.
The tear that is in your eyes taught me what caused it.
Your eyes are on my eyes but I feel that there's a distance between us.
There are upon us. I am losing you, my love.
You want to quarrel with me. A quarrel. So why do you think like that
This isn't the appropriate time. The sorrows aren't getting bigger, my love who is leaving me. Why do I live in this confusion?
Where was my mistake. You will have the right to me

arabic.title: إحلف
text: احلف .. ان انت اتعلمت الحب واول مره يدق القلب على ايدي انا
احلف .. ان انت لا حسيت ولا شفت ولا قبلت في مره ولا عرفت يا حبيب الا انا
اتعب انت اداويني .. اسهر انت اتواسيني .. اعطش واقول ياميه تسقيني ميتك
اذوق من الناس قسيه اذوق حنيتك ..
علمني الحب كله من غير مادفع ثمن ذوقني الحلو كله حببني في الزمن
احلف .. ان انت اتعلمت الحب واول مره يدق القلب على ايدي انا
احلف .. ان انت لا حسيت ولا شفت ولا قبلت في مره ولا عرفت يا حبيب الا انا
احلف .. حتشلني في نن عينك هغرق في بحور حنينك
احلف لكل دقه هدق في قلبنا حنقول للدنيا لأه لو وقفت ضدنا
حنعيش ايام جميله تتعد من السنين وحكايه شوق طويله يحكيها العاشقين
احلف .. ان انت اتعلمت الحب واول مره يدق القلب على ايدي انا
احلف .. ان انت لا حسيت ولا شفت ولا قبلت في مره ولا عرفت يا حبيب الا انا
احلف .. ازعل منك صالحني اغلط وانت اتسامحني
انا عايزك تبقى جمبي لو عيني حيسهرو لو تعب الجب قلبي انت اتصبرو
انا عايز احس اني بطير فوق السما ويغير منك ومني الناس المغرمه

english.title: E7lef
text: Swear ..that you learned to love on my hand ,and that the first time your heart beated on my hand
Swear ,that you never felt ,never saw ,never accepted or knew any lover except me
When I get tired ,you treat me ,when I stay awake ,you commiserate me ,when I feel thirsty ,you irrigate me by your water
I taste from the people a cruelty ,and I taste from you a kindness
Learn me the love without I pay for that .. make me taste all the sweet things ,and make me love this world
Swear ..that you learned to love on my hand ,and that the first time your heart beated on my hand
Swear ,that you never felt ,never saw ,never accepted or knew any lover except me
Swear .. that you will keep me in your eyes ,and I will drown in your eye’s sea
Swear for any beat that beated in our heart ,we will say (NO) to the life if it stand against us
We will live the most beautiful days that it will be counted from the years ,and we will live a long eagerness story that the lovers record it
Swear ..that you learned to love on my hand ,and that the first time your heart beated on my hand
Swear ,that you never felt ,never saw ,never accepted or knew any lover except me
Swear .. when I get angry from you ,you gonna reconcile me ,when I make a mistake ,you gonna forgive me
I wanna you stay beside me ,if my eyes stay awake ,and if my heart get tired ,you gonna give it patience
I wanna feel that im flying over the sky ,and that the lovers envy us ..

arabic.title: إللى في عيني
text: يعنى اللى ف عينى ف عينك
يعنى اللى ف قلبى ف قلبك

english.title: What's in my eyes
text: So what's in my eyes is also in yours after all
So what's in my heart is also in yours after all
My love, I have befriended the Night
because it reminded me of your bosom
So what's on my mind is also on yours after all
So what's hurting me is also hurting you after all
My love, at last you can rest
because I've found my soul by your side
And how do you want me to live?
There is nothing for me but your heart
How is it that you want me to live on?
You tell me, how do you want me to bear it?
When once you're gone, I've nothing left in the world
and fall in love again and again
My love, I don't want to say anything
My love, my heart's learnt its lesson

arabic.title: اقل واجب
text: دة احنا مهما روحنا ولا جينا

english.title: The Least of What Should Be Done
text: see what is going on with me
There was [nothing1] worth it before, nor after you
No matter where we go or what happens
This is the least of what should be done
By God, I am your only one
You are the soul of my soul
You are the only one in the world
how much do I love you3
see what is going on with me
see what is going on with me

arabic.title: الشوك
text: انا منكو ولا انتو مش قد الكلام
ولا المكتوب علينا نعيش علي ظلمكم
وتكلمتو في حقي كتير كتير كتير
هو خلاص ما بقاش في ضمير

english.title: Thorns
text: Thorns have now coated the roses
from one end to the other
And warmth doesn't stand a chance against the cold
and the heart is giving in
Thorns have now coated the roses
Thorns have now coated the roses
Thorns have now coated the roses
from one end to the other
And warmth doesn't stand a chance against the cold
and the heart is giving in
Speak up, why did you change what you were saying all of a sudden
Am I one of you or are you not up to your word
Why are you silent, all of you
Or is it our fate that we must live under your injustice
I have suffered a great deal of pain because of you
And a great deal you've spoken about me
I've loved you a great deal in my heart
and lived with you a most beautiful dream
Do you repay me by hurting me
by making my life an injustice followed by another
Do you not have a conscience anymore
Do you not have a conscience anymore

arabic.title: الواد قلبه بيوجعه
text: الواد قلبه بيوجعه وعايز حد يدلعه
الواد قلبه بيوجعه وعايز حد يدلعه
الواد بيقول الاه مش لاقي حد معاه
الواد قلبه بيوجعه وعايز حد يدلعه
الواد قلبه بيوجعه وعايز حد يدلعه
الواد بيقول الاه مش لاقي حد معاه
حبيبي تجي نجي انا وانت كده
ما بلاش تلعب بالنار حاسب ده الهوى غدار
ما بلاش تلعب بالنار حاسب ده الهوى غدار
الواد قلبه بيوجعه وعايز حد يدلعه
الواد قلبه بيوجعه وعايز حد يدلعه
الواد بيقول الاه مش لاقي حد معاه
يا حبيبي يا ضي عينية مش لاقي فيك حنية
خليك مع قلبي شوية اوعى البعد يضيعه
الواد قلبه بيوجعه وعايز حد يدلعه
الواد قلبه بيوجعه وعايز حد يدلعه

english.title: El Wad Albo Beiwgaao
text: this guys has pain in his heart
and he needs someone to spoil him
he doesn't find anybody near him
this guys has pain in his heart
and he needs someone to spoil him
he doesn't find anybody near him
i can't find tenderness in you
stay a bit with my heart
watch out,don't let the distance make it lost
this guys has pain in his heart
and he needs someone to spoil him
baby let's go you and me
we stay awake like that again
so our days and nights(our souvenirs)
the fire the fire the fire
be careful the love is betrayer
this guys has pain in his heart
and he needs someone to spoil him
he doesn't find anybody near him
this guys has pain in his heart
and he needs someone to spoil himx2

arabic.title: انسى
text: فى شرع مين .. انك تجرح قلب حبيبك .. وما يتألمش
وفى حكم مين .. انك تظلم قلب حبيبك .. وما يتكلمش
مين اللى قال .. انك تقسى عليا وما يهنشى تصالحنى
مين اللى قال .. انك تكسر قلبى وما تجيش تقوله سامحنى
انت ايه انت .. انت مين انت
انسى سنين الهنا ايام حبنا وكل الليالى
وانسى كمان انو انا حبيبتك وكان حب غالى
انسى ياريت اننا دبنا فى بعضنا دى كانت ليالى
وانسى لا لوم وعتاب دا كلام كداب وارحملي حالي
مين اللى قال .. انك تقسى عليا وما يهنشى تصالحنى
مين اللى قال .. انك تكسر قلبى وما تجيش تقوله سامحنى
انت ايه انت .. انت مين انت

english.title: Forget
text: - Under who's orders ("who allows")... can you hurt the heart of your beloved...and (expect) he wouldn't ache.
- and under who's orders ("Who says")... can you wrong the heart of your beloved... and (expect) him to be silent.
- Who told you...that you could be so harsh on me and not apologize .
- Who told you...that you could break my heart and not ask for its/my forgiveness.
- What (kind of person) are you?...Who (do you think) you are?
- No way, forget it...sweetheart...no way, forget it.
- ...my passion, my destined (soul-mate), and my whole world*
- forget the years of happiness, our days of love and all the nights (we spent).
- and also forget that I loved you and that my love for you was strong.
- And please forget that we melted for each other; what great nights/times.
- and forget (the talk about) "No remorse, No regret" because those are lies and please just leave me alone.
- Who told you...that you could be so harsh on me and not apologize.
- Who told you...that you could break my heart and not ask for its/my forgiveness.
- What (kind of person) are you?...Who (do you think) you are?
- No way, forget it...sweetheart...no way, forget it.

arabic.title: اهل الهوي
text: انا اللى كنت بلوم على كل العاشقين
انا اللى قلت الهوى بيذل المغرمين
قلبى قلبى يا غلبان يا طيب
قلبى قلبى ألف مرة وألف نوبة
لا كان على بالى ولا كان
فى خيالي اعشق واسلم فى يوم
اديني لا بقيت مرتاح ولا خالى

english.title: Love's Folks
text: Love's folks1, oh, by God, by God
Love's folk, oh, by God, by God
I used to blame all the lovers
I used to say that love humiliates lovers
and now it snatched my soul and stole
the heart and caught my eye, my love
My heart, my heart, oh poor and kind one
And here we are, we fell in love and affection
And became one of love's folks
Her eyes called me, they commanded me
And my eyes complied with the command immediately
I am staying up, yeah, confused I am, yeah
I cannot find the recipe for a remedy
My heart, my heart, for a thousand times and time
You've told me that you've abandoned love
for a thousand times and time
You've told me that you've abandoned love
It never occurred to me not was it ever
in my imagination to love and give [myself] up [to someone] someday
And here I am; I am neither comfortable nor empty
And my eyes find no sleep
I am staying up, yeah, confused I am, yeah

arabic.title: بأمارة ايه
text: ولسه فاكر تعتذر طب بعد أيه
ولسه فاكر تعتذر طب بعد أيه
خلاص راح اللي راح وخلاص قلبي قدر
ولسه فاكر تعتذر طب بعد أيه
كنت بصبر قلبي عليك .. كنت واحشني ومش بلاقيك
كنت بصبر قلبي عليك .. كنت واحشني ومش بلاقيك
كنت بحب بكل مافيا .. قلبك عمره ماهانش عليا
كنت بحب بكل مافيا .. قلبك عمره ماهانش عليا
واما ماحسش قلبك بيا .. قلت خلاص ليه ارضيه
خلاص راح اللي راح وخلاص قلبي قدر
ولسه فاكر تعتذر طب بعد أيه

english.title: What For?
text: You just remembered to apologize? after what??
You just remembered to apologize? after what??
Seeking my forgiveness of all scares you caused?
Seeking my forgiveness of all scares you caused?
It's over now .. my heart is over you
You just remembered to apologize? after what??
I was guiding my heart to be patient .. i was missing you and couldn't find you
I was guiding my heart to be patient .. i was missing you and couldn't find you
I was loving you with everything i am .. It was never easy to leave you
I was loving you with everything i am .. It was never easy to leave you
But when you didn't feel me .. I said why shall i satisfy him/her?
Seeking my forgiveness of all scares you caused?
Seeking my forgiveness of all scares you caused?
It's over now .. my heart is over you
You just remembered to apologize? after what??

english.title: You're the Only One I Have
text: and you talk behind my back
Why would I feel pity for her?
turns out they were hollow words
Where is she, the one who always needed me?
and made me swear night and day,
she used to say: Without you,
all my life would be misery and bitterness
Misery and bitterness.. Misery and bitterness
Why did I keep my eyes closed?
and how did I let her [do what she did]?
How many times has she lied to me,
and shifted the blame to me?
and why did I forgive her?
while she was fully capable of [the games] of love
Her tears were in her eyes
If you saw them you'd say: That's a shame
No, it's a shame... no, it's a shame

arabic.title: تحدي
text: ده أنا حبي أكبر من غير أكتر
إنت ليه عامل ليه كل ده
ده الغرام عمره ما قالك كدا
قولي مين زيي في يوم دلعك
إنت ليه عامل ليه كل ده ده الغرام

english.title: Challenge
text: Do you think you value love as much as I do
I don't need to say that my love is bigger
Listen to me, just let this day pass by
Darling, I'm 100 times better than you" when it comes to love"
Believe me or just ask around
Believe me, you always act like you understand things on the fly
My love for you is bigger than you think
My love has always quenched the thirst of your heart
are you doing this on purpose
are you sure you know what love is
from the beginning, my love has been big
love has never been like this
Why do you make love sound like this?
just tell me who loved you as much as I did

english.title: A Challenge
text: You're taking it with me as a challenge.
In love, you think your at my level.
Without talking to much , my love is bigger.
Listen to me , and let this day pass.(like stop arguing )
O love i'm 100 times bigger than you.(in love)
Believe me already or even ask around.
Believe me oh one who always
so called understands it all so easily.
My love for you is higher than the highest level
From it how many times your heart tasted and quenched.
And you in you're life, will never appreciate it.
No you're eyes mean it and are on purpose.(looking at him the way they do,challenging)
In love going and completely sure,
of the bet my heart is going to lose.
Live it with me and be stubborn inside my love
And go inside of me and go around much.
Before you talk alot and take so much time.
From the beginning, my love is big.
why are you doing all this.
Love never told you to do this.
And why do you always say he said(he=love)
Tell me who ever "dala3ak" like me (dala3ik is a kind of nuturing very spoilish love)
Even bring your heart and just ask him.
Why are you doing all this.
da ana 7oby akbar mn 3'er ma katar
w ad5ol gowaya w lif kteer
anta leh 3amil leh kol i da, da al3'aram

arabic.title: تعالى
text: ولا قبلك حد تانى ولا بعدك حد تانى
اه يا اقرب منى ليا والله ونور عنيا
من العين دى قبل العين دى ياللى انا بهواك
يا حبيبى يا اغلى ما عندى قولى ازاى انساك
تعالى جوه قلبى تعالى جوه حضنى
قولى مين هيخدك منى ولا مين يبعدنى عنك
يا تاخدى معاك ما ترجع قلبى بينده ما تسمع
البعد معاك بيوجع قلبى حبك ليه
قولى هعمل ايه فى اللى خد عمرى واللى عذبنى يا حبيبى هعمل ايه

english.title: Come
text: There is no one else before you. There is no one else after you.
After you there is no one else
Yeah, O you who is closest to me. For me, I swear, the light of my eye.
From this eye, before this eye, O one whom I love.
O my beloved, O most precious, I don't have anything to say. How can I forget you?
Come into my heart, come into my bosom.
Tell me who will take you from me or who will separate me from you.
Tell me how to forget you!
You take [my heart] with you [and] don't give it back, you don't listen
The distance [from] you pains my heart. Why your love?
Tell me! What will I do? Take my life! You tortured me, my love. What will I do?

english.title: She hurt me
text: I remember I forgave her because
I couldn't imagine life without her
It's easy to sacrifice oneself that way once
Maybe it'll be just like this afterwards (?)
My heart is learning to forget
And it will learn to be tough
She must know that I know
She must know that I know
I'll forget the one who forgets me
She hurt me, and I went to her for healing
She scolded me on my return
My heart is sad, it weeps for her
She hurt me when I loved her
I can't love her any more
And her image will no longer come to my eye (i.e. I'll quit thinking about her)
And her image will no longer come to my eye
And her name will no longer be upon my tongue

arabic.title: خليتني اخاف
text: عارف لما تحس بغربه  جوه مكانك
تبقى لوحدك تدى وتاخد  مع احزانك
واللى خفت العمر منه  صحيت عليه
ياللى خنت قلبى  قوللى كسبت ايه

english.title: You Made Me Afraid
text: You made me afraid of people
And I Became alone  in this world
Even I am in the midst of people
I feel that I am on the far side
You Know when you feel strange in your home
You stay alone thinking about  your sorrows
Look, what are you doing in me ?
You will see what I'll do for you ?
I don't know why my heart deceived me
I don't know why it could sell me
And Whatever I was afraid of  , I woke up by
A betrayed heart from the beginning
From the beginning to the end
You who betrayed my heart? Tell me what did you earn ?

arabic.title: خليك فاكر
text: خليك فاكر إن معاك أنا دوقت المر
خليك فاكر إن الحزن ساعات و تمر
خليك فاكر إنت إخترت تبقي براحتك
أديني مشيت و ريحتك بعدت كمان و فرحتك
أنا عشقتك إنساني أنا الحب خلاني أقول
خليك فاكر إن معاك أنا دوقت المر
خليك فاكر إن الحزن ساعات و تمر
خليك فاكر إنت إخترت تبقي براحتك
أه من الحب لما تغيروا الأيام
أه والعشرة لما تضيع بسرعة آوام
أه من الليالي منك يا غالي
أه من حبايبي و من صحابي
بعت ده كله بجد أنا عشقتك إنساني أنا الحب خلاني أقول
خليك فاكر إن معاك أنا دوقت المر
خليك فاكر إن الحزن ساعات وتمر
خليك فاكر إنت إخترت تبقي براحتك

english.title: Khalek Faker
text: Remember with you I had tasted the sour moments
Remember that sadness lasts a moment and passes
Remember that you were the one who chose to be on your own
Remember with you I had tasted the sour moments
Remember that sadness lasts a moment and passes
Remember that you were the one who chose to be on your own
So I'm gone now and you can relax, I've left so be happy
So I'm gone now and you can relax, I've left so be happy
I loved you for who you are.. Love had made me..
I loved you for who you are.. Love had made me say..

Ohh and the relationship how it is lost so soon

So I'm gone now and you can relax, I've left so be happy
I loved you for who you are.. Love had made me..

Remember that sadness lasts a moment and passes
Remember that you were the one who chose to be on your own

Ohh and the relationship how it is lost so soon
Ohh from the nights you've left me with, precious one
Ohh from my loved ones and friends
Ohh from the nights you've left me with, precious one
Ohh from my loved ones and friends
How much did you sell it all for?
I loved you for who you are.. Love had made me..

ohh so I'm gone now and you can relax, I've left so be happy
So I'm gone now and you can relax, I've left so be happy

Remember that you were the one who chose to be on your own

arabic.title: روحي فيك
text: وليل و نهار قلبى مشغول عليك
واخاف ليزيد شوقى ليك وانت لا
من نارى فى بعدك و لقاك
و الجراح انا من غير حبى

english.title: My Soul Is In You
text: My love, my soul is in you and my years are yours,
And night and day my heart is occupied thinking of you,
And I am afraid I miss you more but you not so,
And afraid that you will hurt me with your hands.
And woe on me, woe because of love,
From the passion even when I am distant I found you,
And my yearning hopes upon you even if someday I don't need you.
Come to me and forget everything that is gone,
The flames of longing, torment and agony,
What do I do except loving you?
You forgot me but I never forgot you.
My love, the companion of my thoughts,
Even if the last thing that remained was longing,
I will not live except within you.

arabic.title: عاللي بيحصللي
text: قلبي بيسبني و بيروح لك ويطير حاوليك
من اول ثانية سبت الدنيا و ذايب في عينيك
it's just known from my eyes
Because of my heart confusion and my yearning , I can't even sleep
You know , your love is something unic
it's different from all the world
and your eyes took me and made me not forget you at all
what happens to me , what is goes on with me!
what happens to me , what goes on with me !
when you are clear with me
your heart takes me , and lives on my lap
and when you forget me , I wait in my own place
you are always in my mind
all yearnings in my life ,oh honey ,I find them with you
and I can die because of your love
and I don't have any dreams except you , and you're taking my mind for nights
قلبي بيسبني و بيروح لك ويطير حاوليك
من اول ثانية سبت الدنيا و ذايب في عينيك

english.title: Ally Beyeshalli
text: what happens to me , what is goes on with me!
what happens to me , what goes on with me !
when you are clear with me
your heart takes me , and lives on my lap
and when you forget me , I wait in my own place
because of my yearning and my love
because of the eagerness of my heart
my heart leaves me , and comes to you flying arround you
and my heart is your prisoner
and not seeing anybodyelse except you
from the first second (means sight) I left the world and I was melted in your eyes
what happens to me , what goes on with me!
what happens to me , what goes on with me !
when you are clear with me
من حيرة قلبي ومن شوقي ما بدوقش النوم
و عينيك شغلتني و خليتني ماانساك و لا يوم
كل الاشواق بعمري يا غالي بلقاها معاك
و ما ليش احلام غيرك انت و شاغلني ليالي
what happens to me , what is goes on with me!
what happens to me , what goes on with me !
when you are clear with me
your heart takes me , and lives on my lap
and when you forget me , I wait in my own place
because of my yearning and my love
because of the eagerness of my heart
my heart leaves me , and comes to you flying arround you
and my heart is your prisoner
and not seeing anybodyelse except you
from the first second (means sight) I left the world and I was melted in your eyes

arabic.title: قاللي
text: آه قال لى يا ما قال لى
ياما قال لى وكان زى الملاك
قال لى ياما قال لى ياما يام
ياما قال لى لحد ما امتلك
اه خد حبنا آآآه خد قلبنا

english.title: He told me
text: He told me my heart is yours
He told me my life is yours
He told me he misses me
Yeh he told me what he told me
He told me alot of things and was like an angle
He brush the floor for me with  flowers
And promised me thousand of things
He told me his my world
He told me alot of thing he said alot he said alot
He told me till you became mine
My eyes is on my luck
My eyes is on his arms
And the heaven turn out to be hell
I was his air and his love
I was his medicine and his doctor
I was the best he got
My soul was melted in him
I never got upset from him
I never I got far from him
And I never have hurted him
I was drawn in my dreams
I was busy on my age
Have I ever got away from him no no
Have I ever betrayed him no no
And I never have ever hurt him in my life
Ah he took all our air
I don't know why he lied to me
What did I do to his heart
I am not his lover not his soul mate why

english.title: he told me
text: he told me my heart is urs
he told me my life is urs
he told me i missed u
he told me more and more
he told me so many times and he was like an angel
he spread flowers on the floor to me
he told me i'm ur world
he told me more and more
he told me till he owned me
and the heaven becomes a hell
i was his love and his lover
i was his medicine and his doctor
i have never get angry of him
and i've never been away from him
and i've never been cruel to him
i wanted him with my life
have i leaved him once? no no no
have i decieved him once? no no no
ah he took my love, he took my heart
aaaah he took from me all the pleasure
i don't know why he cheated me
what did i do to his heart?
not his destiny, then why ?!! why ?!!

english.title: Albak Ya Hawl Ellah
text: You are like Like You dont see And like you dont know what's love means! And you are living your days and your dreams in illusions and lies
Thats it..too bad cause now I am a Guy who dont have A heart many things died inside of you.. And I didnt say a word and didnt say no!
I let my tears to speak While Im in pain and I know That Im Right ! I'll tell you the last words Im saved for you.."this heart never beat"
and your heart ? Now its empty everything died inside of you and you are pleased
Im lost in this world going in sycels.. never saw the land if love doesnt work in this world ..so why Should I taste this pain from the start
I wish you could rest and forget me because your heart is free now no use to stay with you cause you crashed all of my hopes

arabic.title: قلبي أناني
text: على قد ما كان قلبى ضعيف
ويا عينى على قلبي يا عيني
ده انا قايم نايم يا حبيبى

english.title: My heart is selfish
text: And it has not been kept awake at night from loving very much
From the day your eyes called it
Now everything is decided with you
It can't dream except of you
And if you ever think of leaving me
I'll never think to forget you
My heart is selfish, I have a selfish heart
And with your love I am one again
I don't want anyone but me to see you
And I don't want anyone besides you to see me
My heart is selfish and crazy about you
And my passion for you is sincere
When your eyes look upon me with tenderness
I forget my whole life, next to you
Selfish, and I and my eyes live
In your passion, so please don't go away!
Oh, my eyes, upon my heart,
And by God, I am getting no sleep at all!
Take it easy with me, my beloved (?)
This longing is going on for so long!
And I am asleep while standing, my beloved,
I really don't dream of anyone but you!

arabic.title: قوم اقف
text: قوم اوقف بص لي و فهمني
و لا تتكلم و انا بتكلم
و ان غلطت ابقى امشي و سبني
قوم اوقف بص لي و فهمني
انت ليه اه ليه اه ليه انت ليه ما بتحبش
قولي ايه اه ليه اه ليه حتى ما بتسال
لو نسي نعلمو او حتى نفهمو
قوم اوقف و انت بتكلمني قوم و اقف بص لي و فهمني
و لا تتكلم وانا بتكلم و ان غلطت ابقى امشي و سبني
قوم اوقف بص لي و فهمني
وان غلطت ابقى امشي و سبني

english.title: Stand Up
text: - For me to forgive you and be pleased with you...
- ...you must do a lot of things
- For me to forgive you and be pleased with you...
- (you must do) a lot of things and here is the first...
- Stand up when you are talking to me.
- Stand up, look me in the eye and explain/be thorough with me.)
- And don't talk while I'm talking
- And if I'm wrong then walk away and leave me
- Why do you hate hearing that you are wrong?
- tell me why, you don't even ask (about me) and yet you are angry
- if they (your parents) forgot to teach you or even explain to you (2x)
- what you were never taught in your life
- what you were never taught in your life, I will teach you it myself.
- And don't talk while I'm talking
- And if I'm wrong then walk away and leave me

arabic.title: كان زمان
text: كان ... كان ياما كان ... كان فى زمان ...
كان فى قلوب بتحس بيا و تخاف عليا و طيبين
كان .. كان فى حنان ... كان فى امان ...
كانت اديهم تمسح دموعى من عينيا و قريبين
دلوقتى راحو .. راحو يا قلبى من بين ايديا عشرة سنين
و بقينا يا قلبى لوحدنا ويا اللى فات
ح نروح لفين انت و انا من الذكريات
مستحيل انسى فى يوم لمسه ايديهم ..
مستحيل فى يوم يا قلبى نهون عليهم ..
مستحيل فى يوم ح ينسو حضننا عمرنا

english.title: once upon a time
text: that were close to my eyes
now , they're gone , oh my heart , they're gone from between my hands
oh my heart , we bacame alone
where shall we go you and me
no way to forget one day
oh my heart, no way , one day
they wouldn't give up on us that easily
no way they would forget our love ( or our hug , not sure ) , our life
there was once upon a time
that were close to my eyes
there was once upon a time

arabic.title: كل ده
text: وانا ولا زعلته ولا جرحته ولا مرة نسيتط
طيب ليهمزعلنى وغاب عنى وفايتنى وحيد
يرضى مين ده انا افضل انادى عليه ولا يرد الندى
عشان بحبه واعيش لحبه يقوى قلبه عليا كده
طب وربى لقوى قلى لحد مايعودى كله رضا
على الحلوة والمرة لا عمرى جنيت عليه مرة
واعيش عشان ارضيه بقى يعنى يلعب بيا

english.title: all this !!!!
text: my love (baby)  made all this !! x7
how she went away like that
and i didnt make her sad nor hurt her and i never forgot that
so why she makes me sad and away and left me alone
who can accept that i keep calling her and she doesnt answer
because im loving her and living for loving her she makes her heart cruel with me ???
so i swear im gonna make my heart cruel until she comes back to me my love again
my love (baby)  made all this !! x7
how she went away like that
and no night i made her awake
all my life living for her
through good and bad i never hurt her
if its true that she forgot me , come show me
and put her eyes in front of my eyes
my love (baby)  made all this !! x7
how she went away like that
and im living to make her satisfed , so she palys with my heart!

english.title: If you sold me
text: If you sold me, tell me,
don't leave me get angry at people
and their eyes come to tell me.
tell me to forget about this story
you injured my eyes ahh you injured my heart,
aaah stop hurting all of me.
from what i can see from your eyes
I will leave this world and forget
who pilled me up with you.
I can't wait for my promise
buying me? selling me? tell me
you injured my eyes ahh you injured my heart,
aaah stop hurting all of me.
Do I really have to ask my beloved
It never really occurred to me
to ask this question one day.
And No I don't for you to tell me
you injured my eyes ahh you injured my heart,
aaah stop hurting all of me.

arabic.title: مايردش
text: ابعد و امشي و اسيب في نار
افضل انادي و انادي و احايل
و صوب فيي لا موش قادر
و لا يسألاه اه اه اه
تتقل تغرق و انا مش قايل

english.title: he doesn't reply
text: I tell him my love....he doesn't reply
I tell him my master...he doesn't reply
and I return back to begging him..he doesn't reply
I tell him uncle...he doesn't reply
I tell him master..he doesn't reply
I know that I made you sad
believe me , I didn't mean to do it
or are you acting hard to get ?
Do I get away and leave him angry ?
No , I can't stand him being sad
no no no no no no
and I keep crying for him and begging him
and he gets carried away, no I can't stand that
and we will continue to stay away from each other
and we will continue to stay away from each other
I know that he is acting hard to get
acting hard to get yes yes yes yes
and doesn't ask about me yes yes yes yes
but tell him don't get carried away
or you'll drown and I won't say
and we will continue to stay away from each other
I tell him my love....he doesn't reply
I tell him my master...he doesn't reply

arabic.title: مكتوب عليا
text: ولا عمرى مرة اقلك يا حبيبى
وانا كل عمرى يا حبيبى ليك
ده انا كل يوم ما بدوقش نوم وانت ناسينى
بعدك يا غالى مليش غالى ولا حاجه تانى بتحلالى
الليله بتعدى ليالى ولا انت دارى اللى جرالى
كان كل ذنبى حبيتك من البدايه
كام دمعه تنزل وبدارى واكتم غرامى المدارى
الاهه تطلع من قلبى يسمعها كل الناس جنبى
طب وانت فين حبيبى فين تسمع انينى
حبيبى ليه بتعذبنى غلبنى وهواك غلبنى
رغم ان قلبى مهوش قادر من الشوق حبيى منيش قادر
ده انا ويلى ويل ونهارى ليل من دمع عينى

english.title: My Destiny
text: It is my destiny that you be my love
& not even for once i call you my love
& tell my heart to forget you
But i am all yours my love
& you , my love , so far a way
Not minding me living in peace
Want to go to you and leave me
Everyday, I cant sleep ,and you forgot about me
After you, I don't have favorites ,nothing good for me
The night feels like so many ,
& you don't know what happened to me
My fault is loving you first
I gave my heart to started  a story with you
I tried to forget but i cant
I wrote the introduction & forgot the end
How many tears drop & i hide my love
But everybody can hear my pain deep my heart
Where are you to see my pain ..
My love why you torture me ,
Your love defeated me and i cant help it,
My days are dark ,now,with my tears....

english.title: You will regret
text: I told you I told you
I told you that you will regret
Didn't I tell you that you will regret ?
You will regret  You will regret
You come back to me after you sold me out
You come back to me saying forgive me
After you walked away and got your heart broken
You come back to me asking for me to heal your wounds
I wanted you but you hurt me
I trusted you and you betrayed me
Not your words not your wounds
not even your tears will shake me
Your heart is full of wounds
There is no victim there is no wrongful
ou come back to me after you sold me out
You come back to me saying forgive me
After you walked away and got your heart broken
You come back to me asking for me to heal your wounds
I wanted you but you hurt me
I trusted you and you betrayed me
Not your words not your wounds
not even your tears will shake me
Forget about my heart that you used to hurt
You have not seen pain yet
Forget it it's over forget it

english.title: You who left me
text: You who left me, meeting you seems so far
You who left me, My soul is in your hands
My eyes are used now to not seeing you
My heart is used now to your torture
I swear I love you and I want you
You who left me, You who said goodbye
You who left me with my heart in pain
Is it fair that your heart forgot me?
I thought I swept through your blood and veins
You act like you sold me out
You act like you abused me
You act like you forgot me
You tell me that you want to break up with me
If the whole world forgot me
If the whole world challenged me
I'll find you by my side, missing me
My eyes and my heart are used to
I'm your past and I'm your present
How is it possible you can live without me?
This time you left me for too long

arabic.title: وبناقص
text: ضيعت عمري وراك باقيلي ايه تاني
سبت كل الدنيا واديتك عمري وحياتي
اديتك حنية أتاريك السبب في آهاتي
إنت بتلعب بيا وهي دي جزاتي
ضيعت عمري وراك باقيلي ايه تاني
انسي اللي فات خلاص ده فات من عمرنا
كتر المرار يا حبيبي ضيع حبنا
وانا قلبي مات ما بقاش يهمه بعدنا
ده ما كانش ليك غير إني اكون قاسية عليك
عملت ايه لما الحنان اديته ليك

english.title: To hell with...
text: and to hell with my life with you
for how long have I been waiting for you?
I've wasted my life running after you. What do I have left?
I left the whole world and gave you my years and life 1
I gave you tenderness, turns out you're the reason for my pain
you're preying on me, this is what I get in return
and to hell with my life with you
for how long have I been waiting for you?
I've wasted my life running after you. What do I have left?
forget the past, we're already done with it
too much pain has wasted away our love, my love
and my heart has died, it no longer cares if we're apart
you deserved nothing but my cruelty
what did you do when I was good to you?

arabic.title: وتندم ليه
text: وتندم ليه لما تكون قدامك جنه وما تشوفهاش
يبقي خلاص قلبك يستاهل ما يعشهاش
كل الندم اللي انت ندمته يفيدني بايه
قلبي خلاص هيعيش دلوقتي وينسي ماضيه
كنت فاكرني بعيش علي الماضي وهستناك
اوجع قلبي معاك من تاني علشان اوهام
قلي ازاي انا هنسي الجرح مع الايام
اتعلمت يكون في حياتي حاجات غيرك انت اهم
اتعلمت ماحسش بعدك اي الالام او هم
ايه هتقول كل كلامك مش هياثر فيه خلاص
ايه هيغير قلب ما يعرفش الاحساس
مهما تقول مش هتحمل تاني اكمل وهم كبير
ضحيت يا ما وماللي اسيته تعبت كتير
اللي شاريك بتسيبه و بتروح للي يبيع
واللي في ايدك ما تحسوش غير لما يضيع
شفت ازاي عشت معاك اصعب ايام ولا اثر فيك
اصعب من اللي عشته معاك ان ارجع ليك
اتعلمت يكون في حياتى حاجات غيرك انت اهم

english.title: Wa tendam leah
text: why would you regret having heaven in front of you and not seeing it
then your heart doesn't deserve to live in it
how would all of your regrets help me
my heart is gonna live for now ( for today ) and will forget the past ( the yesterday )
did you think that I will live in the past and I won't forget you
would I hurt my heart again with you and all for nothing
tell me how would I forget the pain through the days ( through time )
I learnt to have more important things in my life than you
I learnt not to feel any pains or Concerns after you
whatever you say , all your words are not gonna affect me anymore
what would change a heart that doesn't feel ( he means her heart )
whatever you say I won't be able to continue this illusion
I sacrificed many times , and after all the suffer I had , I got so tired
the one who wants you , you leave him and go to the one who doesn't ( the one who doesn't want you )
and you don't feel what was in between your hands until you lose it
did you see how did I live with you difficult days , and that still didn't affect you
but what's more difficult than what I have lived with you , is coming back to you
I learnt to have more important things in my life than you
I learnt not to feel after you

english.title: Why Would You Regret It
text: Why would you regret it when it was right in front of your eyes and you were too blind to see
You heart deserves not to live this love
I'm sorry why all this regret you are feeling, what will you gain?
My heart will live and will forget it's past, why are you coming back?
Does it bother you that I was capable of forgotting you?
Did you think I would live in the past and wait for you?
Why should I put my heart through pain just on a whim
Tell me how do I forget the pain with the days
I've learned to let other things in my life than you
I've learned not to feel any hurt or worries after you left
Why would you regret it when she was right in front of your eyes and you were too blind to see
You heart deserves not to be with her
I'm sorry why all this regret you are feeling, what will you gain?
My heart will live and will forget it's past, why are you coming back?
Does it bother you that I was capable of forgotting you?
Did you think I would live in the past and wait for you?
Why should I put my heart through pain just on a whim
Tell me how do I forget the pain with the days
I've learned to let other things in my life than you
Tell me how do I forget the pain with the days no no no
What you have something to say? It won't bother me at all
You can't change a heart that doesn't have feelings
No matter what you say I will not act on my whims
I've sacrificed so much and from your roughness I was exhausted
You leave your partner and run to the one who sells you
You couldn't feel what was in your hands until it was lost
See how I lived my hardest days with you and you didn't feel for me
And what would only be harder for me would be to go back to you
I've learned to let other things in my life than you
Tell me how do I forget the pain with the days
I've learned to let other things in my life than you
Tell me how do I forget the pain with the days no no no

arabic.title: ومالنا
text: مش عارف امتا هنبطل نكدب على بعض
ولا عارف امتا هنتعلم ونسامح بعض
جرحنا الدنيا وبنجرح انا وانتا فى بعض
جرحنا الدنيا وبنجرح انا وانت بعض

english.title: What is going on with us?
text: What is going on with us, what happened to us?
What is going on with us, what happened to us?
(I think the above could also be read "We don't want each other anymore", etc. etc.)
We lost the sense of security
We were unjust to times past
And we forgot ten things each
All that we have left are mistakes
Oh, if only we could see the tears in each other's eyes
It would be so hard on us
It would be so hard on us
I don't know when we will take this hatred off each other
And I don't know when we will learn to forgive each other
The world hurt us and we are hurting each other
The world hurt us and we are hurting each other

arabic.title: ويــاك
text: ويــاك الوقت عدي وساعات فاتت ثواني معرفش ازاي وامته هنقابل بعض تاني
ويــاك الوقت عدي وساعات فاتت ثواني معرفش ازاي وامته هنقابل بعض تاني
لما اوحشك غمض عنيك واندهه عليه انا هسمعك واحسك بيك وتحس بيا
صورتي في ايديك بوسها بعنيك... وبعتلي وردة
ويــاك الوقت عدي وساعات فاتت ثواني معرفش ازاي وامته هنقابل بعض تاني
...لا بعاد هيبعد بينا ولا شوقنا هيضيع منا
تقسي الليالي ونرجع بالحب اقوي ما كونا
لما اوحشك غمض عنيك واندهه عليه انا هسمعك واحسك بيك وتحس بيا
...لما اوحشك غمض عنيك واندهه عليه انا هسمعك واحسك بيك
وتحس بيا صورتي في ايديك بوسها بعنيك وبعتلي وردة
صورتي في ايديك بوسها بعنيك... وبعتلي وردة
ويــاك الوقت عدي وساعات فاتت ثواني معرفش ازاي وامته هنقابل بعض تاني

english.title: With You
text: With you, the time passed, the seconds passed
I don't know how or when we will meet again
When you miss me, close your eyes and call me
I'll hear you, I'll feel you and You'll feel me
My photo in your hands, kiss it with your eyes
With you, the time passed, the seconds passed
I don't know how or when we will meet again
Nothing will take us apart, no longness will be missed
Life becomes harsh, and we become stronger with love
When you miss me, close your eyes and call me
I'll hear you, I'll feel you and You'll feel me
My photo in your hands, kiss it with your eyes
My photo in your hands, kiss it with your eyes
With you, the time passed, the seconds passed
I don't know how or when we will meet again

arabic.title: يا ترى
text: يا ترى يا حبيبي يا ترى
انت فين يا حبيبي يا ترى
حزين و لا سعيد و لا
قريب و لا بعيد و لا
دانا كلي لك و بحن لك
يا ترى يا حبيبي يا ترى ااااااااااااه
انت عارف اد ايه البعد قاسي
انت عارف اد ايه البعد قاسي
لو نسيتني لسه قلبي مش ناسيك
يا ترى يا حبيبي ياترى اه
يا حبيبي عمري انا عمال بيجري
و انت فاكر لسه لسه العمر باقي
يا حبيبي عمري انا عمال بيجري
و انت فاكر لسه لسه العمر باقي
ياللي الحياه و الدنيا بجلستي معاه
كل ليله بحلم كل ليله بحلم
قريب و لا بعيد و لا
حزين و لا سعيد و لا
حزين و لا سعيد و لا

english.title: Ya Tara
text: i wonder my love i wonder
i wonder my love where are you
i wonder my love what do i do
the love has gotten bigger or went away
should i go away and forget you or
or should i wait for you or
i am all yours and i miss you
and i miss you i swear
i wonder my love i wonder
you know how much being apart is hard
you know i'll be harder after you
if you forgot me my heart still remembers you
if you sell me my heart is still buying you
i wish i see you i wish
my love, my age is running
and you think life is stood still
sitting with you worth life and living
i dream every night i dream every night

arabic.title: ياللي بايع
text: كنت بخاف طول عمري عليك اكتر من روحك يا
ياللي زمان انا كنت غرامك قلي ازاي تنسى
انا كنت بخاف طول عمري عليك
يا حبيبي خلاص كفاية وصلتنا للنهاية
صدقني خلاص هانساك وخلص هتروح من بالي
لو يعني بايع طب ياللي بايع
خذ وانت ماشي كل اللي يفكرني بيك
لو يعني بايع طب ياللي بايع
ا دي قلبي لو هتلاقي غيره يخاف عليك
لو يوم حتبيع انا لازم ابيع زي ما بهوى اللي بيهواني
حبيبي خلاص انا فاض بيا ليه بس تصعب عليا
لو يعني نسيت ما تقولي نسيت

english.title: Oh, one who is selling/betraying/leaving/letting go.
text: All my life, I used to fear for you more than you did for yourself.
O One, who I used to be your love, tell me how you could forget!
You were closer to me than myself.
My life for you is too little. (term of Endearment)
All my life I used to fear for you.
Turns out that you weren't for me and you weren't even precious.
O Love, it's enough, we arrived at the ending.
Believe me I will forget you and you will finally go from my thoughts.
If you are selling, then Oh one who is selling.. (term expressing betrayal)
Take with you while you leave everything that reminds me of you.
If you are selling, then Oh one that is selling.
Here is my heart if you'll find other than it to fear for you.
If one day you intended to forget me.
I will be able to step on my sorrows.
If one day you'll sell , I have to sell just like to love who loves me.
My love , It's over , I have fed up..why do i feel so sorry for you.
If you have forgotten, just tell me you have forgotten.
And I , my love will forget that you are mine.

arabic.title: ياللي ماشي
text: اللي ماشي وناسي إني .. ليا في عيونك أماني
مفتركتش حاجه مني .. اللي بيها تجيني ثاني
والسنين اللي قضيتها.. تفوت من غير حساب
والقصور اللي بنيتها.. كانت قصور فوق السحاب
والحنين اللي فعيوني.. تبقى عينه في التراب
لالالالالا ولاولالا.. قبل ماتفكر تبيعني.. هاتلي شاري للعذاب
أنت.. أيوا أنت.. أيوا أنت.. أنت ايه مفتركتش وأنت ماشي ناسي ايه
د أنت ناسي حاجات كثير..كثير.. ناسي حب كبير.. كبير كبير
زي رماد النار فايتاه.. زي الدمع العين ناسياه
أنت قلبك بحر موجه يعاني فيه..
أنت شهدك أحلى مر سقيتني فيه

english.title: Yally Mashy
text: oh the one who is leaving and forgetting...that i have hopesin your eyes
didn't you remember one thing about me that makes you come back to me again?
and the years i spent...are going by without counting
and the castles i built...were castles over the clouds
and the longing in my eyes...its eyes remain in the dirt
no and no...before you think about solding me out,bring someone who buys tortures
you,yes you,you're the one that went and didn't remember what you were forgetting while going
cause you're forgetting many things many you're forgetting a big love,big,big
you're passing by it as the dust of the fire
your heart is a sea with waves suffering in it
your honey is the most bitter things you leaked me with

arabic.title: يومين وعدو
text: كان كل شيء فالدنيا ملكة وبين ايديه
وماكانش فيه إحساس في يوم يندم عليه
دول كانوا ياما.. دول عمر فات

english.title: two days pass
text: to whom he gave this emotions
the one who sold him cheaper
than the price he paid for her
he didn't melt like we did.. if only we reach salvation
she rejected to live in my shelter
everything was her's and on the palm of her hand
and she has no feeling of regret
and there was no feeling of regret in a day,
the breeze of love passed and its winds were born,
he regrets the one to  whom he gave his  emotions
And who sold him cheaper than the price he paid for his affection
It was easy for him to break his wing,
Two days and they passed.. and left
And they left  my heart .. between wounds,
They  were days..  an age that passed,
We are tired of longing .. we should rest, because we're tired,
and if only she had a pity on me .. she sold my love for free,
its  truth has shown alone and she didn't hide it,
Why we love someone who doesn't love us,
two-day of love passed, and i wish they didn't.
and it was easy for her to break his heart,
And they brought my heart .. between wounds

arabic.title: ٣ دقائق
text: ليلي ليلي يا ليل يا ليل
يا ليل ليلي يا عين يا ليل

english.title: 3 minutes
text: See you, get together with you
See you, get together with you
If you're angry with me, berate me
If I did something wrong, punish me
And if your eyes and your heart
tell you to let me go, then let me go
Oh you who's been away for so long
Even if because of my love for you
I'm lost because of my sorrow
Why must we make our hearts suffer
Why must we be OK with our torture
And run away from the truth
I only want to see you
All night and all day long
My tears are awake in my eyes
Do not send me back, dearest one
I intend to make things right with you
To hurt you is too much for me to handle
I beseech in the name of the nights that we stayed up together
Tell me that you've forgiven me
All night and all day long
My tears are awake in my eyes
Do not send me back, dearest one
Oh, if only you could see what I'm like
What's happened to me after you left me
It's torture, it's hell, it's turmoil
You are all that's beautiful in the world
And for you to spend a single night away from my gaze
Pigs would have to fly first

arabic.title: إنت النسخة الأصلية .. إنت إستثنائي
text: انت مين انت اللي في منك في الكون كتير
والا انت عارف انك انت غير
انت مين بتحب نفسك بس وغيرها مافيش
والا اللى علشان الناس ديما يعيش
انت مين متردد في الحياة بين البينين
والا اللي عارف رايحة الخطوة فين
قلبك كريم ومحدد الطريق انت ايه
التاريخ بيقولوا إن البشر هما نوعين ناس بتأثر
النسخة الأصلية مفيش منها وضد التقليد
انت اللى لمعة النجوم بتبان في عنيك
انت اللى كل فيك بيقويك بيعليك
انت اللي عمره ما لحظه خاف انت اكتشاف
ومين يقدر عليك انت احلى حاجة فيك
مش زي الباقي شايف بكرة وباصص لبعيد
انت مش حاجة عادية النسخة الأصلية مفيش منها وضد التقليد

english.title: "You are Exceptional"
text: Who are you ? Are you from  the ordinary people in the Universe,Or you know  you are different ?
You have a walking path ,You will walk through it
Who  are you?Do you love  just yourself ?
OR,  You devoted yourself to help people
Like the  cloud  is rain and good
Who are you , hesitant in life between this and that
Or, who knows where the step goes?
Your heart is generous and you know the way.
History says that humans are two types , people  who affect and people who  are spectators
And who are you between the two?
You see tomorrow and you look forward
You are not an ordinary man
The original copy,it is one and  against imitation
You , the glory of the stars appears in your eyes , Every thing in you makes you strong and high
You, who has never been  afraid, you are a discovery
And who is can defeat  you, you are the best thing in you
Not like the rest of, you see tomorrow and look forward
You are not  an ordinary ,original copy, it is one and against imitation

arabic.title: الدنيا
text: يا ما قلت مع ناس كتير
يا ما قلت مع ناس كتير

english.title: Life
text: For many times has it hurt people
For many times has it hurt people
This one suffered, and this one is in anguish
And this one she demeans and this one she humiliates
and for this one she laughs him in the face
while holding back humiliation for him behind her back
And this one became a Pasha because he is a traitor
For this one she bears darkness and ugliness
and this one, because he follows his heart
She beats him and puts him down
And we contented ourselves, and here we are, drinking bitterness
And we remained silent and were trampled by feet
Many times have we been tortured and humiliated
By God's grace heaven should be for us
She is making us drink woe in chalices
In wounding she is using us like property
And we are helpless and without power
She makes us struggle and she took away layers from us2
For many times has it hurt people
She makes us struggle and she took away layers from us2
And we contented ourselves, and here we are, drinking bitterness
And we remained silent and were trampled by feet
This one suffered, and this one is in anguish
And this one she demeans and this one she humiliates
and for this one she laughs him in the face
while holding back humiliation for him behind her back
And this one became a Pasha because he is a traitor
For this one she bears darkness and ugliness
and this one, because he follows his heart
She beats him and puts him down
And we contented ourselves, and here we are, drinking bitterness
And we remained silent and were trampled by feet

arabic.title: فينا نغير
text: قولك في أمل انه البكره الجاي أجمل
وإنه الحزن الي فيا بيرحل لو مهما حصل
لو مهما حصل، بدك تبقى عمري وحدِّي
وخدك ما يبعد عن خدي، ويعطيني الأمل
فينا نغير ماضينا، نكتب أسامينا ع خدود القمر
فينا نشبك ايدينا، تضحك عينينا بليالي السهر
فينا نغير ماضينا، نكتب أسامينا ع خدود القمر
فينا نشبك ايدينا، تضحك عينينا بليالي السهر
قولك في أمل؟ انا بدي ابدا مشواري
لو مهما حصل، رح نمشي سوا ونسافر
ع جناح الفرحة للآخر، لو مهما حصل
فينا نغير ماضينا نكتب أسامينا ع خدود القمر
فينا نشبك ايدينا، تضحك عينينا بليالي السهر

english.title: We Could Change
text: Do you think there's hope for tomorrow to be more beautiful,
and for the sadness in us to depart no matter what?
No matter what happens, I want you to be my life and by my side
and your cheek would never leave mine, and gives me hope
We could change our past, write our names on the cheeks of the moon
We can tangle our hands, our eyes would laugh in the nights spent staying up
We could change our past, write our names on the cheeks of the moon
We can tangle our hands, our eyes would laugh in the nights spent staying up
Do you think there's hope? I want to begin my journey
and love you day and night, and you give me hope
No matter what happens, we will walk together and travel
on the wings of happiness till the end, no matter what happens
We could change our past, write our names on the cheeks of the moon
We can tangle our hands, our eyes would laugh in the nights spent staying up
